mapper.update: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ${table_name} ( name varchar(128), call_count int not null default (0), average_time_ms decimal(15,4) not null default (0), total_time_ms bigint not null default (0), created_on timestamp not null default current_timestamp, updated_on timestamp not null default current_timestamp, primary key (name) );

INSERT INTO ${table_name} AS t (name, call_count, average_time_ms, total_time_ms) VALUES ( #{name}, 1, #{time_taken_ms}, #{time_taken_ms} ) ON CONFLICT (name) DO UPDATE SET updated_on=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, call_count=t.call_count+1, total_time_ms=t.total_time_ms+EXCLUDED.total_time_ms, average_time_ms=(t.total_time_ms+EXCLUDED.total_time_ms) / (t.call_count+1);
